data1.Desc: The “blocked resources” issue occurs on the main page of the Jira application installed from the platform Marketplace
An error occurs when installing the Jira application from the platform Marketplace
Custom configuration values are not preserved on the new LiteSpeed node when scaling in a stateful mode
An error occurs when reloading configs on Traffic Distributor for environments with non-Latin characters in names
The Git-Push-Deploy add-on installed on the extra layer deploys the project to the application server layer
Only one environment is displayed in the BitNinja dashboard after cloning an environment with the BitNinja add-on
An error occurs when opening the admin panel page for the DjangoCMS application installed from the platform Marketplace
An error occurs when installing the OwnCloud application from the platform Marketplace
The outdated Docker image API tag version is used in the Jira, Eclipse Che, Plesk, and Odoo applications from the platform Marketplace
An error occurs when installing the OpenVPN application from the platform Marketplace
Memory auto-configuration is not applied on the PHP-based stacks when decreasing cloudlets number
The Gemfile.lock file is deleted when scaling the Ruby application server that is mounted with the Shared Storage node
An error occurs when changing the cloudlets number for the Apache PHP application server that is mounted with the Shared Storage node

data2.Desc: Isolation rules/sets generation is not interrupted upon failure
New users cannot register with SMS verification
SSH Gate error notifications have links with the old platform domain
